column4: does anyone knows how to stop the (offical) flash plugin for firefox from grabbing exclusive use of /dev/dsp (even tho i have an audigy card with hardware mixing and i am using alsa not oss) ? I have tried all the stuff i can find in the forums to solve this.
i have tried the alsa-oss package, but i can't find one by that name
i couldnt find the module i was thinking of just then either...
